content: Zinc nitrate (214.2 mg) was added into DI water (3.0 mL) as a triggered solvent. Then, this solution was added to DI water (21 mL) in which ICA (276.8 mg) was dissolved. The reaction mixture was stirred for 12 h at room temperature at 300 rpm. Then, the ZIF-90 product was collected via centrifugation at 8000 rpm, 6 min, and washed three times with DI water. The amorphous ZIF-90 was synthesized by the same approach but the molar ratio between ICA and Zn2+ was 1:1.
clean_text:
Materials and Methods

Synthesis of ZIF-90 and aZIF-90

Zinc nitrate (214.2 mg) was added into DI water (3.0 mL) as a triggered solvent. Then, this solution was added to DI water (21 mL) in which ICA (276.8 mg) was dissolved. The reaction mixture was stirred for 12 h at room temperature at 300 rpm. Then, the ZIF-90 product was collected via centrifugation at 8000 rpm, 6 min, and washed three times with DI water. The amorphous ZIF-90 was synthesized by the same approach but the molar ratio between ICA and Zn2+ was 1:1.
